text.div:
Specimen Role

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
B Blind Sampleadded v2.4
C Calibrator, used for initial setting of calibrationadded v2.4
E Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC resultsadded v2.5
F Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler)added v2.5
G Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified)added v2.5
L Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.)added v2.5
O Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiencyadded v2.5
P Patient (default if blank component value)added v2.4
Q Control specimenadded v2.4
R Replicate (of patient sample as a control)added v2.4
V Verifying Calibrator, used for periodic calibration checksadded v2.5

name: v2.0369
title: v2 Specimen role
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0369 ( Specimen role)
